thread.title: Chrissy Teigen cuddles baby Luna in cute family photos as Moroccan holiday comes to an end
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen cuddles baby Luna in cute family photos as Moroccan holiday comes to an end

author: Lara Martin
title: Chrissy Teigen cuddles baby Luna in cute family photos as Moroccan holiday comes to an end
text:
Chrissy Teigen cuddles baby Luna in cute family photos as Moroccan holiday comes to an end Chrissy and husband John Legend have been enjoying a family break in Marrakech   Chrissy Teigen shares baby Luna's first word   
Chrissy Teigen and baby Luna have once again cemented their place as one of the celebrity world’s most photogenic mother and daughters. 
The pair posed up a storm on Instagram on Wednesday afternoon as their family holiday with John Legend to Morocco came to an end. 
Chrissy shared a beautiful image of herself kneeling in a garden with little Luna, 11 months, safely ensconced between her legs. 
“Last day. My love,” she captioned the pic. This sunny picture was taken on the last day of the vacation (Photo: chrissyteigen/Instagram) 
A make-up free Chrissy looks beautiful in a low cut leopard print swimsuit and denim shorts, while Luna is dressed in a punk striped sun dress. 
Another image shows Chrissy puckering up for a kiss with Luna, who looks like she’s been enjoying a dip in the swimming pool as she’s all wrapped up in a grey towel. Chrissy puckered up with Luna in another photo (Photo: chrissyteigen/Instagram) 
Chrissy, musician husband John and baby Luna arrived in Marrakech at the weekend, with Chrissy sharing a pretty photo to Instagram showing her and John looking glamorous in evening wear while posing inside the courtyard of a grand building. 
She kept fans updated throughout the trip with other pictures including one of her and Luna at a spice market, and one showing her kissing John in the desert. 
Another pic sees Chrissy playing around while enjoying a camel ride.
